segments.advisor_message: Great to hear you're excited! Before we dive into investments, can you tell me a bit about your current state of health? This helps us understand any potential risks.
segments.client_message: Yeah, sure! I'm feeling pretty good, you know, just the usual stuff. No major health issues at the moment.

segments.advisor_message: That's good to hear! So, are you a smoker at all? Just trying to build a complete picture here.
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, I smoke a bit, maybe like... a pack every couple of days? I’ve been smoking since I was 18. But I don't think it affects my health too much.

segments.advisor_message: Understood. It's always better to be aware of these factors when planning for investments. Now, do you have a will or any power of attorney set up?
segments.client_message: Um, I do have a will, it’s around... oh, like five years old? And no power of attorney yet, though. Just, you know, figuring things out.
